page.title: 16Linlithgow's Local Paper.
page.content: Our local newspaper is the Journal and Gazette.Here are some reports from the 2nd of May 1985's issue. The establishment of a link between Linlithgow and the Edinburgh Festival is in the news.The week-long Festival Link will include tours,trips, exhibitions,son et lumiere and an enactment of a 17th century civil war engagement at the Peel. Another article is about the government plans to privatise the bus service.Concern is being expressed that it will result in the disappearance of all rural routes, leaving Linlithgow with only a through service to Edinburgh and Falkirk. Linlithgow Academy has been closed for one day as teachers were on strike.Industrial action is being taken by members of the E.I.S.union to press for an independent pay review.
